answer: Please check your internet connection or try again later. If the problem continues, contact support.

question: server is down

question: getting error on website
answer: We’re sorry for the inconvenience. Please take a screenshot of the error and email it to tasknexus2025@gmail.com.

question: What is included in the Premium Dynamic Website package?
answer: The Premium Dynamic Website package includes 6–8 pages with an admin panel, content update system, contact form (DB + email), SSL, advanced SEO tools, blog section, payment gateway integration, and more.

question: Lifetime free access ka matlab kya hota hai?
answer: Lifetime free access ka matlab hai ki aapko kabhi bhi platform use karne ke liye yearly charges nahi dene padenge. Aapka admin panel aur website lifetime tak accessible rahega.

question: Monthly maintenance fee kisliye hoti hai?
answer: Monthly maintenance fee regular updates, bug fixing, backups, server monitoring aur support ke liye hoti hai. Yeh ensure karta hai ki aapki website smooth aur secure rahe.

question: Pro Website Package me AI-powered content creation kya karta hai?
answer: Is feature se aap automatic content generate kar sakte hain jaise blogs, descriptions, etc. using AI, which saves your time and boosts SEO.

question: Kya Starter Package me admin panel milega?
answer: Nahi, Smart Starter Package me admin panel nahi hota. Lekin client panel hota hai jahan aap status dekh sakte hain.

question: SEO Package me kya-kya included hai?
answer: SEO package me keyword research, on-page optimization, backlink building, technical audit, competitor analysis, aur monthly reports milte hain.

question: Logo Design Package ke files kis format me milenge?
answer: Aapko high-quality files milengi: AI, EPS, PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF — jise aap kisi bhi platform pe use kar sakte hain.

question: Web application aur website me kya difference hota hai?
answer: Website mainly informative hoti hai jabki web application me login, dashboard, authentication, CMS jaise interactive features hote hain.

question: Mujhe bilingual website chahiye. Kya possible hai?
answer: Haan, Premium Dynamic Website package me multi-language support included hai.

question: Client Panel ka matlab kya hota hai?
answer: Client panel ek mini-dashboard hota hai jisme aap apni website ka status, updates aur analytics dekh sakte hain.

question: Kya payment gateway integration me Razorpay, Stripe supported hai?
answer: Yes, hum Razorpay, Stripe, PayPal jaise major gateways integrate kar sakte hain.

question: Pro Package me activation cost ₹149 kaise pay karni hoti hai?
answer: Activation cost advance payment ke time pe li jaati hai, mostly via UPI, bank transfer, ya card.

question: Smart Starter Package me delivery time kitna hota hai?
answer: Starter package 5–7 din me deliver ki jaati hai, agar saari details timely mil jaayein to.

question: Agar mujhe later kuch features add karwane ho to kya kar sakte hain?
answer: Haan, aap future me features upgrade karwa sakte hain. Charges depend karenge module ke complexity pe.

question: Kya desktop app offline bhi kaam karega?
answer: Yes, desktop application fully offline compatible hota hai with local database support.

question: Small Desktop App kis platform ke liye hota hai?
answer: Windows, Mac, aur Linux — tino ke liye available hai as per your requirement.

question: SSL certificate free milega ya alag se lena padega?
answer: Premium aur WebApp packages me SSL certificate free me included hota hai.

question: Custom branding ka kya matlab hota hai?
answer: Custom branding me hum aapke logo, color scheme aur brand identity ke according design karte hain.

question: Virtual Reality Integration kya hota hai website me?
answer: Is feature se aap apni site me immersive VR experiences add kar sakte hain — useful for real estate, products showcase, etc.

question: 24/7 Human-like Support kaise kaam karta hai?
answer: Ye AI-based chatbot hota hai jo real-time me users ko queries ka jawab deta hai jese ek insaan deta.

question: Newsletter System ka kya benefit hai?
answer: Aap directly apne users ko latest updates, offers, aur blogs email ke through bhej sakte ho.

question: Blog section SEO ke liye kitna important hai?
answer: Blogs aapki website ki ranking improve karte hain aur audience engagement badhate hain.

question: Kya basic package me Google Analytics milega?
answer: Google Analytics sirf Web Application aur Pro Package me included hai.

question: Kya EMI options available hain?
answer: Currently EMI available nahi hai, but aap partial payment kar sakte hain on mutual agreement.

question: Activation cost ek baar hi pay karni hoti hai?
answer: Haan, activation cost sirf one-time hoti hai jab aap project start karte ho.

question: Kya aap mera existing website upgrade kar sakte hain?
answer: Yes, hum redesign and upgrade services bhi provide karte hain. Uska alag quotation diya jaata hai.

question: Kya mujhe domain aur hosting lena padega separately?
answer: WebApp package me domain & hosting 1 year ke liye free included hai (if billed annually). Baaki packages me alag cost hoti hai.

question: Kya main apne hosting panel se website control kar sakta hoon?
answer: Haan, agar aapko cPanel ya Plesk chahiye, to hum uska access provide karte hain.

question: Kya Android app bhi bana sakte hain isi website ka?
answer: Haan, agar aap backend-ready package lete hain (like WebApp), to usi API se Android app bhi develop ki ja sakti hai.

question: Mujhe ecommerce chahiye, kaunsa package best rahega?
answer: Premium ya WebApp Package ecommerce functionalities ke liye best hai — with payment gateway and admin panel.

question: Hosting ke liye kya provider use karte ho aap?
answer: Hum Hostinger, AWS, GoDaddy, ya client ke preferred hosting providers ka use karte hain.

question: Backup system automatic hoga ya manual?
answer: Mostly automatic backup system integrate kiya jaata hai jo regular schedule pe files save karta hai.

question: Client panel aur admin panel me kya difference hai?
answer: Client panel viewing ke liye hota hai, jabki admin panel se content edit/update bhi kar sakte hain.

question: Kya maintenance lena zaruri hai?
answer: Maintenance optional hai, but recommended hai for smooth updates, security, aur uptime assurance.

question: Website ka data mera hoga ya aapka?
answer: Pure 100% data ownership aapki hogi. Hum sirf service provider hain.

question: Kya website me custom animation add ho sakta hai?
answer: Haan, aapka requirement ho to custom 2D/3D animations integrate ki ja sakti hain.

question: Mujhe sirf homepage design karwana hai. Kya possible hai?
answer: Yes, aap custom request de sakte hain. Ek-page design ka separate quote diya jaayega.

question: Kya package customize ho sakta hai according to my need?
answer: Yes, sab packages fully customizable hain. Aap jo features chahte ho woh add/remove ho sakte hain.

question: Kya aapka system GST invoice Provide krte hai?
answer: Haan, hum GST invoice provide karte hain on request.

question: Delivery time kya rahega har package ka?
answer: Starter: 5–7 days, Pro: 7–10 days, Premium/WebApp: 10–14 days depending on requirements.

question: Kya website SEO-ready milegi?
answer: Yes, sabhi packages me basic ya advanced SEO tools included hain for ranking.

question: Kya main website me khud se content edit kar sakta hoon?
answer: Haan, Premium aur WebApp package me content update system diya jaata hai jisse aap khud changes kar sakte hain.

question: Kya aap logo designing alag se bhi karte hain?
answer: Yes, humara Logo Design Package available hai with unlimited revisions aur social media kit.

question: Kya performance optimization bhi hota hai?
answer: Yes, Smart Starter aur WebApp package me advanced performance optimization included hai.

question: Kya website offline kaam karegi?
answer: Nahi, sirf desktop apps offline work karti hain. Websites require internet.

question: Kya mere product list ke liye bhi CMS bana sakte ho?
answer: Haan, CMS se aap products/services easily add/edit/delete kar sakte ho without coding.

question: Kya client testimonials aur image galleries bhi add ho sakte hain?
answer: Yes, we can include testimonial sliders, image or video galleries as per design.

question: Kya aap social media integration karte hain?
answer: Haan, sabhi packages me social media links aur sharing options included hote hain.

question: Kya mujhe domain khud se lena padega?
answer: Nahi, agar aap WebApp package lete hain to domain free milega for 1 year. Baaki packages me alag se lena padega.

question: Kya aapka support team 24/7 available hai?
answer: Yes, humara support team email aur chat ke through 24/7 available hai for assistance.

question: getting error on website
answer: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please take a screenshot of the error and email it to tasknexus2025@gmail.com.

question: Service Plans and Pricing
answer: Premium Dynamic Website ₹24,999/-. Pro Website Package ₹19,999/-. Smart Starter Package ₹4,999/-. Basic Web Application ₹9,999/-. Small Desktop App ₹4,999/-. Logo Design Package ₹1,500/-. SEO Package ₹7,999/-.  Web Application with Admin Panel ₹19,999/-.
